name: apollo-fetch
author: Chris Cole
description: Scalable, simple URL shortener with user accounts and more!

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Server,Client" -c "green.bold,cyan.bold" "cd server && yarn dev-server" "cd client && yarn start"
scripts.build:server: cd server && yarn && npm run build
scripts.build:client: cd client && yarn && npm run build --prod
